scripts.docs: bower list -p > output/resolutions.json && purs publish --dry-run --manifest bower.json --resolutions output/resolutions.json
scripts.test: bower install && pulp build --no-check-main --modules Test -- --stash --censor-codes=WildcardInferredType,ImplicitImport,ImplicitQualifiedImport && pulp test
scripts.build: bower install && pulp build --no-check-main --modules Export -- --stash --censor-codes=WildcardInferredType,ImplicitImport,ImplicitQualifiedImport && purs bundle "output/*/*.js" -o js/chaldeas.js --main Main --module Main --module Export && uglifyjs js/chaldeas.js -c -m -o js/chaldeas.js
